brief_summary.textblock:
This study is to assess the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of single dose and
      multiple doses of humanized anti-VEGF monoclonal antibody (Sevacizumab) in patients with
      advanced or metastatic solid tumors. The secondary objective is to explore the preliminary
      anti-tumor effects.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase Ia, Dose Escalation Study of Humanized Anti-VEGF Monoclonal Antibody (Sevacizumab) Injection in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase Ia, Dose Escalation Study of Humanized Anti-VEGF Monoclonal Antibody (Sevacizumab) Injection in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
